title: OEM Unlock option in gray, why?
content:
Hi, i have a Google Pixel, compilation number: QP1A.191005.007.A3, Android 10, security patch 6 October 2019.
My OEM Unlock option stay in gray, forums talk about Verizon Pixel's got this issue because the carrier lock.
I don't know if my Pixel is from Verizon or not.
Someone tell me some information?
